channel.title: NPR Topics: Home Page Top Stories
channel.description: Top stories in the U.S. and world news, politics, health, science, business, music, arts and culture. Nonprofit journalism with a mission. This is NPR.
channel.copyright: Copyright 2024 NPR - For Personal Use Only

image.title: NPR Topics: Home Page Top Stories

item.title: Israeli airstrike on a Palestinian refugee camp in Lebanon kills 13 people
item.description: An Israeli airstrike on a Palestinian refugee camp in southern Lebanon on Tuesday killed 13 people and wounded several others, state media and government officials said.
item.content:encoded:
An Israeli airstrike on a Palestinian refugee camp in southern Lebanon on Tuesday killed 13 people and wounded several others, state media and government officials said.

(Image credit: Mohammad Zaatari)
item.dc:creator: The Associated Press

item.title: Can weed help you drink less? Scientists study how well 'California sober' works
item.description: It's trendy in some circles to replace drinking with consuming cannabis. But can it help people with a drinking problem cut back? Scientists set up a bar in the lab to find out.
item.content:encoded:
It's trendy in some circles to replace drinking with consuming cannabis. But can it help people with a drinking problem cut back? Scientists set up a bar in the lab to find out.

(Image credit: Nick Dentamaro/Brown University)
item.dc:creator: Will Stone

item.title: Texas appeals ruling that Trump-urged voting map is racial gerrymandering
item.description: A federal court in El Paso ruled that the redistricting backed by Trump and Republicans to reshape the map for the 2026 midterms was based on race, not just political advantage for the GOP.
item.content:encoded:
A federal court in El Paso ruled that the redistricting backed by Trump and Republicans to reshape the map for the 2026 midterms was based on race, not just political advantage for the GOP.

(Image credit: Eric Gay)
item.dc:creator: Blaise Gainey

item.title: Pope Leo calls out 'extremely disrespectful' treatment of migrants in the U.S.
item.description: The U.S.-born pope has spoken out several times against his native country's treatment of migrants in the U.S.
item.content:encoded:
The U.S.-born pope has spoken out several times against his native country's treatment of migrants in the U.S.

(Image credit: Gregorio Borgia)
item.dc:creator: Jason DeRose

item.title: What does 15 look like? Teens and former child actors weigh in online after Megyn Kelly comments
item.description: After commentator Megyn Kelly seemed to downplay the youth of Jeffrey Epstein's victims, former child actresses and current teenagers took to social media to express outrage.
item.content:encoded:
After commentator Megyn Kelly seemed to downplay the youth of Jeffrey Epstein's victims, former child actresses and current teenagers took to social media to express outrage.

(Image credit: Evan Vucci)
item.dc:creator: Ivy Buck

item.title: U.S. deports dozens of migrants to Ukraine amid war
item.description: Immigration lawyers say those deported to Ukraine could be conscripted to fight in the war, contrary to international laws that prohibit deportations to places where people could face violence.
item.content:encoded:
Immigration lawyers say those deported to Ukraine could be conscripted to fight in the war, contrary to international laws that prohibit deportations to places where people could face violence.

(Image credit: Oleksii Filippov)
item.dc:creator: Ximena Bustillo

item.title: Judge sides with Meta in antitrust trial, will not spin off WhatsApp and Instagram
item.description: A federal judge ruled against the Federal Trade Commission's antitrust suit alleging that Meta had stifled competition by buying up its rivals.
item.content:encoded:
A federal judge ruled against the Federal Trade Commission's antitrust suit alleging that Meta had stifled competition by buying up its rivals.

(Image credit: Tony Avelar)
item.dc:creator: John Ruwitch

item.title: Trump administration shares new moves to dismantle more of the Education Department
item.description: Opponents of the changes say Congress explicitly located some of these offices inside the Education Department, and the White House cannot legally move their work without Congress' approval.
item.content:encoded:
Opponents of the changes say Congress explicitly located some of these offices inside the Education Department, and the White House cannot legally move their work without Congress' approval.

(Image credit: Stefani Reynolds)
item.dc:creator: Cory Turner

item.title: Trump defends Saudi crown prince over question about killing of Khashoggi
item.description: President Trump lashed out a reporter in the Oval Office who was asking about allegations the crown prince orchestrated the killing of Washington Post journalist Jamal Khashoggi.
item.content:encoded:
President Trump lashed out a reporter in the Oval Office who was asking about allegations the crown prince orchestrated the killing of Washington Post journalist Jamal Khashoggi.

(Image credit: Win McNamee)
item.dc:creator: Saige Miller

item.title: In Ben Stiller's showbiz family, there was little separation between home and stage
item.description: After his parents died, Stiller found a stash of their audio recordings. Those tapes of comedians Jerry Stiller and Anne Meara are at the center of the documentary Stiller & Meara: Nothing Is Lost.
item.content:encoded: After his parents died, Stiller found a stash of their audio recordings. Those tapes of comedians Jerry Stiller and Anne Meara are at the center of the documentary Stiller & Meara: Nothing Is Lost.
item.dc:creator: Terry Gross
